programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff conducts a crash test to show why everyone should make sure their next car has electronic stability control. Vicki is at a motor show in Monte Carlo, where she reveals the latest Pagani hypercar and test drives the controversial Fisker Karma.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell travel to Romania to sample some of the car culture there. This includes driving some massive off-roaders, meeting a local classic car restorer, and racing a motorsport mad Mayor up the streets of his town.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Legendary Hollywood stunt co-ordinator Vic Armstrong teaches Vicki Butler-Henderson, the same stunt he taught Tom Cruise. She has to hit a ramp perfectly to roll the car as a climax to the chase.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson learns the skills needed to drive in the Special Forces, from former Royal Marine sniper Aldo Kane.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is joined by Norwegian rally prodigy Andreas Mikkelsen for a high octane motoring triathlon - race in a 200bhp off road buggy, perform an autotest in a Skoda Fabia hot hatch, and battle wheel to wheel in single seat race cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is taught how to drive a car on two wheels; Jonny Smith gets to be a real live human crash test dummy when he visits Germany for some extreme airbag testing.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Tom Ford is testing the opulent £225,000 Bentley Azure with some help from film director Michael Winner; Jonny Smith tries to drive coast to coast using chip fat as fuel.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Vicki Butler-Henderson drives the one-off supercharged Nissan Murano GTC; Jonny Smith challenges the world's biggest lawnmower to a head to head in a grass cutting contest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff try to master the controls of the Red Dragon, a 1700 hp Monster Truck. Jonny drives the new Renault Megane. Tom tests BMW's premium luxury car, the 7 Series. Tom Cave - a 17 year old Welsh rally sensation challenges Vicki.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki takes the Focus RS and the Escort Cosworth to find out once and for all which handles best around a track. Jason drives the Grand Tourer and delivers his verdict whether the £78,000 asking price would represent money well spent.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests the Mercedes Vito X or the VW Transporter Sportline on the track to find out which is quickest. Jonny embarks on the 600 mile transcontinental trip in the BMW 635d. Tom drives the ultimate 4x4, the 12 tonne, 10 foot tall Unimog.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives the Pagani Zonda, an astonishing Italian supercar that boasts a 7-litre, 550 horsepower engine and 200 mph plus performance.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Do cars explode like they do in the movies? Tiff Needell and Adrian Simpson stage their own car chase and then watch the experts who've worked on James Bond movies take over for the special effects.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of we're literally taking Fifth Gear to new heights and celebrating the most spectacular challenge petrol-heads have ever invented.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear guest presenter and Touring Car champion Jason Plato tests Chrysler's new 300C. Is this would-be competitor for the likes of the Mercedes E-class really a car to be taken seriously?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson was the only British journalist invited to test drive Ferrari's new race car, the F430 Challenge. Tom Ford takes an exclusive one-off look into the secret world of the Maybach.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jon Bentley is on a mission to discover Britain's Most Prestigious Car. Fifth Gear have commissioned a poll by experts You Gov, and can tonight reveal the results of their 2,000 person survey.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff drives the Lamborghini Gallardo Superleggera Jonny goes to meet another pioneer of alternative fuels - a cider farmer who uses rotten apples to produce methane that powers his Jaguar and Tom drives the £260,000 Rolls-Royce Drophead Coupe.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Where are your children safest - in a 4x4 or an MPV? Fifth Gear finds out with a spectacular 'worlds first' crash test between a Landrover Discovery and Renault Espace.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives Suzuki's hot hatch, the Swift Sport; Tom Ford drives the awesome Aussie supercar, the Vauxhall Monaro; Vicki Butler-Henderson fulfils a lifetime ambition and drives a racing truck.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is the first journalist in the world to drive the astonishing £150,000 Gibbs Aquada, an amphibious car that breaks the mould. Vicki tests it out on the open road and the ocean wave.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato helps a lottery winner choose a new supercar, Tiff Needell road tests the new Jaguar XK on the best road in the world, and Tom Ford meets Jenson Button at the Geneva Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In a superb world first, Tiff Needell gets to drive a Williams Formula 1 Grand Prix car. With exclusive access to the team we're allowed to follow Tiff every step of the way.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell poses the question, "What's the best GT car you can buy for £90,000?" He tests the top contenders which both come from Stuttgart - the Mercedes SL55 AMG and the Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which is quickest - an old Vauxhall against a new one. Jonny Smith and Tom Ford contest one of motor sport's oldest and most gruelling events, the Exeter Trial. Tiff Needell goes to France to drive the new Audi A3 Cabriolet.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tests Ford's Focus ST170 and concludes that it's a good car in a refined sort of way but no rival for the current hot hatch favourite, Honda's Civic Type-R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason head to the track in the new BMW Z4 and Porsche Boxster. Jonny gets behind the wheel of what could be the most perfect car in the world - the brand new Golf GTi. Tiff Needell is in the first all-new Lotus for 13 years - the Evora.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson has a mini-moto race against some of the biggest names in bike racing; Tom Ford tests the new Land Rover Freelander on Britain's most remote school run.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is finding out if progress has been made by Mitsubishi, as she races a classic Evo 6 against the very latest Evo 9.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of Fifth Gear Adrian Simpson will be asking what makes a celebrity car valuable and what doesn't, and he'll be meeting the people who buy them and collect them.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato tests the new 911 Turbo, Vicki Butler-Henderson presents a high speed crash test, and Tom Ford drives a new Lamborghini.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is given his toughest mission yet - to do one month's motoring in 24 hours. It's in a bid to give the new BMW 3 Series the ultimate road test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford puts the Bentley Continental Flying Spur to the test. We take the fastest four door saloon in the world on a tour of Britain and see just how many swanky events Tom can visit in 24 hours?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom tests the chic rival to the MINI the Fiat 500; we find out if fuel additives really work by testing four leading brands; Jonny and Tom build and test an armoured Rolls-Royce with live ammunition and Tiff drives the Ferrari 430 Scuderia.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits the tiny Renault Sport Twingo 133 against the Renault 5 GT Turbo. Tom finds out Vauxhall's replacement for the Vectra. Tim relives the terror of his driving test to find out why fewer people than ever are passing their test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests the new Hyundai Coupé. It was massively praised by motoring journalists on its launch it Italy. They even likened the £14,000 South Korean car to a mini Ferrari 456.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Jonny Smith celebrate the legendary Jaguar E-Type's 50th birthday by retracing a famous journey from the car's past, Tiff Needell thrashes the brand new BMW1 SeriesM Coupe in Scotland.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason is in Iceland being taught how to race a brutal Formula Off-Road buggy up a cliff of volcanic rock by a former champion. Tiff is joined by former Le Mans winner Guy Smith to test a new version of Bentley's best selling car - the Continental GT.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny examines the Smart ForTwo and Toyota iQ. Jason is in Italy behind the wheel of the the Ferrari 458 Italia. Tiff talks to 2008 F1 World Champion Lewis Hamilton about the only car that could threaten the Ferrari - the McLaren MP4-12C.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Jonny face off in the series' first van versus pick-up challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is joined by German petrolhead legend and Queen of the Nurburgring Sabine Schmitz. They're finding the ultimate machine for thrill seekers, pitting the latest Caterham 7 against its hardcore rivals from Morgan and Ariel.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell pit what could be the greatest drivers' car of the century - the Toyota GT86 - against its tough rival from Renault Sport. Jonny Smith is in Spain to put Jaguar's brand new F-Type through its paces
